file_content.text: I have nothing to say to you.
You shouldn't have come here, Sith. I've got eyes and ears all over this city.
I heard all about your little talk with the Escalus whelp. Lucky for you, I'm feeling generous, so I'm willing to make a deal.
You are in no place to bargain.
Deal? Ha!
How about you give me the lightsaber and I let you live?
Beg for your life.
Look. I am standing here with Nar Shaddaa's toughest mercenaries. Guys that make the Sith look like schoolteachers.
So what I'm thinking is, you're going to listen to me. That's what I'm thinking.
Go on.
Here's what I propose: I give you the lightsaber, and you come work for me as my own personal Sith. That, or you pay me three million credits.
A Sith doesn't pay. A Sith takes.
That's not how it works.
Hard to believe, but you're actually dumber than you look.
Idiot.
No. [Shock]
Aaaaaah!
All right, then. You made your choice. Boys, kill the Sith!
Um, sir, you do realize--
No complaints! I don't pay you to complain! Kill her. Kill her! What are you doing?
No complaints! I don't pay you to complain! Kill him. Kill him! What are you doing?
Sorry, boss. You can't pay me enough to fight no Sith.
Walk away, boys. No one has to get hurt.
He's not worth dying for.
Yeah, I like the sound of that.
I'll make it quick, I promise.
Aw, come on.
No way. I got no plans for dying any time soon.
Boys, let's get outta here while we still have our hides, huh.
Wait! This isn't what I pay you for! You fools! You'll never work on Nar Shaddaa again!
I don't think they care.
They're not listening.
Just hand over the lightsaber.
You know what I want.
I'm sick of your voice.
Shut up. [Shock him]
Aaaaaah!
Look, I'll make you another deal, okay? I'll give you the lightsaber, you let me live. It's not like you could open the case anyway.
The lightsaber, and you clear the Escalus girl's debts.
You need to help Mila, too.
Fine, fine. I cancel the debts, and you can have your lightsaber. Just don't kill me.
Now get out of here, please!
Deal.
Take it! Take it! Now get out of here, please.
I'd rather kill you.
No. [Kill him]
Aaaaaah!
You don't get off that easy.
Sorry, too late. [Attack]
No! I don't want to die!
